entry.title: Why I Blog
entry.content:
Hello World!

I decided to create a blog for a couple of reasons.

  1. To improve my writing
  2. To explore new thoughts and insights
  3. To remember my experiences

Blogging is a great activity. My goal is to stay committed at least for 1 year, writing 2 times per week at least. Letâ€™s see how it goes!
